heading: Profile Detail
subHeading: Manage your account information and security settings in one place.
pwdManagementSubtext: Update your current password to a new one.
accountSettingsSubtext: Update your account details, security and notification preferences.

passwordValidation.minLength: Password must be at least 12 characters
passwordValidation.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordValidation.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordValidation.number: Password must contain at least one number
passwordValidation.special: Password must contain at least one special character
passwordValidation.helperText: Must be at least 12 characters including 1 Number, 1 Special character and 1 Uppercase.
